title: Work On your Client
body: So today im trying to play ranked and every time i get into a Queue the game crashes and i have to wait 30 minutes to play another game and this has happened 8 times already today Please Riot Work on your client!! And this is my alt account my main is ZuesLee.

replies.body:
Crashes while in queue or in champ select are often caused by the client losing its connection to the servers. I strongly recommend you ensure your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if these crashes persist through those changes.
